next.title: Contacts: Viewing the Timeline of a Contact

title: Contacts: Importing Contacts
body:
Contacts: Importing Contacts¶

You should have navigated to the pop-up tab to add a new contact. If you are having trouble getting to this point, refer to Adding A New Contact.
This option for adding new contacts should be used when the contacts’ information is stored elsewhere and you would like to transfer it into the Maha Platform.

  1. Click Import Contacts

  2. Select the program to which the contacts you would like to import will belong

  3. Choose one of the following contact sources:

    • Click Excel or CSV File and upload the file containing the contacts

    • Click Add a Source and select one of the external contact record platforms: Constant Contact, Google Contacts, Mailchimp or Outlook 365 and select desired contacts

  4. Click Save
